name: Joi Ford
text: LONG wait while the employee took her 45 minute lunch. Mind you the lunch hours posted are 12-1 and this was at 1:45. She LOCKED THE DOOR! Clients kept knocking.  People with appointments could not get in!  She was by herself. I get that you have to eat, but as nurse I haven’t received a lunch break many times! You eat quickly and keep moving! The lab closed at 3:30!

name: Austin Hart (SmartFishing)
text: Appointment at 9, got there 8:45. It’s after 10 and still haven’t been seen. People lined up in the hallway. Understaffed and unprofessional. Get with it Labcorp. People have other things to do than wait until it’s convenient for you to do your jobs. Update: Waited 4 hours and was never seen!

name: Brandy Taylor
text: Worst lab experience ever. I am shocked that this place is still in business. Very unprofessional staff.  First clue should have been what lab runs out of collection tubes needed for common laboratory testing?!?! Do yourself a favor and go to another laboratory.

name: Sean
text: I had as lovely of an experience as you can expect from a blood draw.  Tons of CORONA safety measures in place and each staff I interacted with was extremely pleasant.  Labcorp was efficient and painless (always a nice bonus)

name: Josiah Radcliffe
text: Hours of operation show they are open til 3pm but when you arrive there is a paper sign on the door that says they are closed from 12-1pm for lunch. So frustrating after making the 45 minute drive and arriving at 12:10pm!

name: Elizabeth Taylor
text: This is the worst place I've ever tried to contact. I took my 1 year old to get his labs done (he has epilepsy and other disabilities so this is crucial for dosage regulation). They did great with handling how rough everything went to getting his blood. But a week later the office in Harvest, AL called me after hours and didn't have a message. I tried calling back immediately but they didn't answer. Days later, I contact his doctor and they never faxed over his results. The doctor office and I have both been trying to call the office for days and they won't answer the phone. I even called right when they opened several times today and nothing. This is absurd. You should never ignore the phone if you have the ability to answer and I STILL need the results. I will never recommend this office or any LabCorp to any friends or family members.

name: Stacey
text: Make an appointment on line and  they have highly skilled phlebotomists.  Never had a problem and Naomi ROCKS!  Thank you!

name: Philip Hahn
text: I get it, no one likes having their arm stabbed, but I have never had problems with this location. Wait times seem reasonable, checkin is streamlined, and it's convenient to where I live. Staff are nice and do good work.

name: Annette Charles
text: This place sucks. Very short staffed. Extremely slow. Patient care is none.... Do  not recommend this place. My Doctor suggested another office. Should have went to the other one... I have no clue what they are doing.

name: Linda Shawley
text: They are always friendly and helpful

name: Emily Ford
text: Great people. Was in and out in probably 15 minutes for a urine test. Very nice ladies there

name: Levi Griffin
text:
I went in for blood work, and the staff I encountered were friendly and professional. I did not have an appointment, but they were able to see me right away.

Drawing blood from me can be difficult, but the nurse was able to do it quickly with minimal discomfort on my part.

I have read the negative reviews of this establishment and can say that I did not encounter any of the problems they reported. It seems the issues with unfriendly staff have been corrected.

If I need any further blood work done, then I won't hesitate to return here for it.

name: James Shipma
text: Terrible customer service. Tried to access my results online: had to make an account, OK I can do that. After creating my account, I was told that my information was incorrect. It was not. After THAT I re-entered the correct information and then the system said the information couldn't be validated and I had 30 days to resolve my account (?)... I called my local location and I got a machine telling me the address and office hours, and if I needed help getting my results online, to go to the login portal where all this mess started. I need these results to begin my job and it's taken far too long. Very disappointed.

name: apps apps
text: Service is terrible here. If you have a choice go to HH lab

name: Lily Jaiswal
text: Very slow. Not open for lunch

name: Bob Birmingham
text: Used them many times. Never had a problem getting blood drawn.

name: Aaron Lussi
text: What a useless business. How are you going to schedule someone during your lunch break and make them sit and wait for an hour, cause everyone leaves. Why isn't there an option for 0 stars?

name: Sharon Webber
text: My experience at this office for a simple drug test was horrendous.  The woman working there, Donna Bourdeau, was extremely unprofessional, uncaring, and rude to my children and me.  She refused to allow my daughters to sit in the lobby while I was in the restroom (a total of about 3 minutes for the entire drug test including paperwork), though there was no one else even in the office.  She was aggressive, curt, and downright mean.  Do NOT go to this office if you have children or prefer not to deal with a woman such as this.

name: Google User
text: Will never use this LabCorp again. Doctor ordered some extensive tests. Had to go by the lab to pick up supplies and collection instructions.  Not only did the woman at the front mess up one of my tests, but she offered very unprofessional and unsolicited opinions about my testing. Have written a formal complaint letter, but after reading all the negative reviews about LabCorp, I doubt anyone in the company will give a hoot. This woman at the Jeff Rd location needs to leave the medical field immediately, and flip burgers for a living.  She is completely inept, unprofessional, and unable to maintain an acceptable level of discretion and maturity required for this job.  I will never step foot in this location again even though my Dr's office is directly across the hall. Thankfully, I took my tests to HH labs where they caught the fact that LabCorp messed up one of the tests. Will only go to HH for any future tests.

name: James Stubblefield
text: Very un profesional. I had to get a drug test required for admissions to one of my classes. THe two ladies that were there were very unprofessional!! They kept arguing back and forth when I told the lady at the window I was ready for the test, She yelled at the top of her lungs YOUR DRUG TEST IS READY! and there were people in the waiting room! And the ladies cell phone kept ringing!! I will report to Calhoun that they need to find someone else to do the drug panels!!

name: Kimberly Cooper
text: This place isn’t staffed adequately enough for the volume they receive. Appointments are merely suggestions. I was seen >30 min after my scheduled appointment time. Staff was very apologetic.

name: Franceska Wackmann
text: There's no need to make an appointment, because even when you do they will still take the walk ins. Despite the fact they knew there was an appointment coming in. I asked how long it will take before she got to me,  she responded she "doesn't know, there are two ahead of me."  I looked at the clip board,  the "two ahead of me" didn't have an appointment.  Meanwhile I came on my lunch break.

name: AU Link
text: Very unprofessional,  they did not want me to be there when they opened up

text: It is closed. May 2021.

name: william whitaker
text: Nice Doctors and staff

name: Kimberly Rossler
text: Nobody is at the front desk ever !! The first visit they lost my orders so I was prepared to bring my orders in this visit . Horrible… I even made an appointment but yet have been sitting here for an hour. This location is just sad, always has been but my doctor called orders into this location.

name: Joy Glenn
text:
First of all when you enter the office, absolutely NO instructions or a human being to instruct patients to use the kiosk to sign in. We waited FOR OVER ONE HOUR to get lab drawn. Every one that came in went back while we waited and waited. FINALLY  we were called back by the ABSOLUTE RUDEST human being on this earth!  My daughter which is very sick and afraid wanted me to accompany her....the lab tech asked her if she really needed me, from then on her attitude was worse and worse.  After my daughter told her she was a hard stick due to little veins, boy, she took that to heart. Another tech came in and we finally left.
Yesterday, we received a call that there wasn't enough blood so we were told to go ahead and go down there they will be waiting. MIND YOU we were under the assumption they closed at 5 p.m. due to what we were told the last time we were there. we arrived at 3:55 p.m. we went in and the SAME rude lab tech which NEVER told us at that time they were closing. EVERYTHING we TRIED to ask she cut us off in the most condescending tone and was ABSOLUTELY RIDICULOUS!
.

name: Charlene Smith
text: Aisha Gilmore was my technician today. She was absolutely fabulous! Not only was she friendly and professional, she was so gentle that I never felt the needle. I didn't even realize we were done. Thank you, Aisha, for making this a quick and easy experience.

name: Christopher Peters
text: Angela provided top notch customer service. I appreciate it!

name: Scott Knowles
text: Went this morning & had the best experience you could have when takin' a drug test. Very friendly staff who did a great job getting me in & out quick as possible!! Very satisfied!!!

name: Nolan Crowe
text: I had to get blood work done today, the lady who helped me,  her name is Angela. Quick and friendly.  Didn't feel when she drew the blood.  Recommend this place.

name: Rhonda Allen
text: I choose the location on Montlimar because of the EXCELLENT service provided by the ladies at this location. They try their best to give you a Great experience. Aisha is very cordial, helpful and makes sure my orders are processed correctly. Angela is virtually as painless as it gets for a very sensitive me. She takes the fear out of getting lab work done. 😀Her kindness flows as well.

name: mickey swaboda
text: They hang up on you multiple times if you try making a appointment

name: Summer Davis
text: Went in to do a drug test today. I waked in and was immediately told to check in at the kiosk. Once I went back to do the test the directions the woman gave me were said very quickly and were mumbled. I thought I heard 30, so I assumed I needed to fill the cup up to the 30 line. I came back and she asked me (with an attitude) if I knew I was supposed to be doing a drug test today and did I not have to use the restroom. I told her I thought it was enough and She told me with an attitude again that it was supposed to be up to the 45 line. The only reason I’m giving two stars is after I told her that she rushed through the directions she SORT OF apologized and said she does it so much a day she goes quickly. I understand she does this all day, but you’re dealing with people. Some of these people have never done a drug test before or it has been a fairly long time. It needs to be done with less of an attitude. I shouldn’t walk out feeling stupid or like I was taking up her time when she’s paid to do this.

name: Laura Christian
text: Aisha was great and got us in quickly and made the experience painless even with our two kids in tow.

name: Perry Reed
text: This was an amazing place. Got there right when they opened and was literally out in 10 mins. The young lady who helped me was sweet and very good at what she does. Wished I could remember her name but either way amazing job. It's people like you that make things like this easier to deal with.

name: Todd Phillips
text:
The ladies at this office were Wonderful!! Aisha was very nice and had a Great personality!!  I was their less than 45 minutes. I hope they can get more help so they can answering alot faster.
RTR!!!!

name: ROBBIE SEAMAN
text: Get skipped and wait for hours

name: Gene Parnell
text: Sloooowwwwww

name: Alan Hinkel
text: I didn’t hear, hey how are you. I heard “ You have to check into the kiosk first “ Okay. I went to the counter and said how long will it be. I heard “ Well, there is one, two, three, four people ahead of you. “ I can count. I don’t know how long it takes for each patient. So, before I even go back, they’re getting 1 Star. They shouldn’t get that.

name: Jasmine Terry
text: In and out very fast. Friendly professional staff.

name: Casey Welborn
text: Rushed, but thorough and accurate. Just wish they didn't rush people so much.

name: Cryo Xeen
text: Told me the bill would be $100, sent me a bill for $300.

name: Leigh Corfman
text: I regularly have lab work done here. The staff is always professional and good to work with. I would suggest them to anyone looking for a lab to use in Gadsden, AL. Thanks!

name: Jason Welsh
text: Got blood work done, only got stuck once. They also will give you a text when they are ready for you so you don’t have to wait in the lobby.

name: Keith Landers
text: Very unprofessional.  Web site to check your labs does not work correctly and the lab work was not posted 3 weeks later and noone could tell me where it was.  I will have to have the lab work done again at another facility.  Will never use this one again.

name: Roy Reynolds
text: Came in for a pre-employment drug screen, a simple urine test that LITERALLY takes minutes. Waited almost an hour.... 💩 NEVER WILL GO BACK TO THIS LOCATION. HORRIBLE

name: stephanie self
text: Quickly got my lab work done.

name: Sherry Rylander
text: Unprofessional staff. Intimidated my Mother into paying a bill from 2015 that had already been paid.

name: Jesse Boldt
text: Rude

name: Khalil Caldwell
text:
I went here a urine screen and was initially treated great by a young man that took my sample and acted professionally.
Unfortunately upon calling a week or so later was greeted by a very unhappy, frankly rude female receptionist. I asked if there was a result for my test and she then mocked me saying, “If didn’t pay for the screen then they own my urine” (laughing in condescending tone).
I understand that these offices have no incentive to treat their patients with respect because companies usually pay for their services; however, it was unusual to be treated disrespectfully out of the blue by a stranger that was probably having a bad day.
Good luck if you are an employee having to deal with this company. 👎🏽👎🏽

name: Linda Kicker
text: Staff person did a great job. It was painless. I was taken on time. Clean office.

name: Michelle Downs
text: They were very professional, friendly and timely.

name: Ebony Peak
text: I went to this facility to have labs done. I was sent here by my doctor. The company charged me a fee that wasn’t supposed to be charged, did not complete all my labs, did not even have all the labs that were requested by my doctor. My doctor then reached out to them advising me that they were not supposed to charge me anything. Was advised that they were to be issuing me a refund to call them to go pick it up and was treated horribly as if I had done something wrong. The lady who answered the phone had a nasty attitude and talked sassy to me. I don’t recommend this facility nor would I ever visit here again.

name: Stacia Gaines
text: I really appreciated the courteous and accommodating staff person who worked me in.  Their process was streamlined and felt safe.  The test was not painful, and they called me with results within 2 hours.  They did seem to be short-staffed, but the folks that were there worked hard to keep things running smoothly.

name: Kendra Chambers
text: I went to ARCpoint for a COVID test last Friday and the process was seamless! The receptionist, Amy was SO friendly on the phone when I booked my appointment. When I came in, I waited for just a few minutes and quickly got tested. Kim, who administered my test has an excellent bedside manner and was also very kind! I received my results the same day within an hour. This was truly a wonderful and stress free experience!

name: Earl Pecor
text: They knew i was there for a hair drug test for my job and seen i had short hair but didnt say anything till i waited a hour to get called back.

name: Sarah Edmonds
text: Scheduling was quick and easy. I called in the late afternoon and was able to make an appointment for the next morning. At the time of my appointment, was very easy and fast in and out.

name: Sherry Harris
text: I highly recommend ARCpoint Labs of Birmingham.  They are quick, efficient, and welcoming.  They stagger their appointments so you are not sitting in a waiting room full of people waiting to get a Covid-19 test.  They also give you all the information to file your insurance for the fee.  Best of all, results by the end of the day!  I was so impressed that I shared their contact information with the entire staff where I work.

name: Victoria Ebrahimi Charles
text: Unfortunately I’ve had multiple covid tests. Brian makes the test almost painless and is very personable. Every person on the staff is helpful and goes out of their way to make the experience as easy as possible. Great facility!

name: Maria Schaffer
text: Easy to make an  appointment.  They get you in and out fast.  Staff is very friendly and helpful.  Great experience.

name: Don Blackall
text: Awesome people. Quick and easy. In and out testing. Quick results.

name: Kristen Dixon
text: I was very pleased with ArcPoint! I was in and out and the staff was amazing!

name: Sergio Hernandez
text: Worst place ever!!!  Brian the guy with earrings and completely rude will send you back telling you a lot of BS if you get there 30mins before closing, their sign and website says that they do ”take walks in” but it’s a totally lie, they sent me away twice (second time I was there 1hr and 20 mins before closing)... Pretty much you can tell this guys just wanna go home and don’t care about their costumers...

name: Forsyth White
text: Very easy and quick test - and results emailed quickly!

name: Michael Hill
text: Very courteous and professional. We were in and out in just a few minutes and the results of the test was emailed to us before the end of the day.

name: Nancy Harris
text: The staff was professional and efficient!  It couldn’t have gone any better.  Appointment at 10:00 and I was told results would be available by 430. I had an email with my results within two hours.

name: Rebekah Wales
text: The fastest appointment I have ever been too. I was tested for COVID here twice. I was not in the facility for more than 10 minutes from the time I walked in to the time I walked out. Everyone was very friendly and I had no issues. Would definitely recommend.

name: Andrea Thames
text: Everyone in the office is always so nice!  Love how quick they are!

name: Chelsea Johnson
text: Went there for Covid testing. It was clean and felt safe. I was in and out quickly. The staff was friendly and professional. I got my results within an hour. I highly recommend this testing facility!

name: Shiraz Merchant
text: Great experience - Prompt, professional, courteous and timely results.  Makes no sense to try and save a few dollars and deal with the zoo's at the doc in the boxes when you can come to ARCpoint Labs.  You get what you pay for!

name: Luis & Megan Devoto
text: Front desk receptionist was new but friendly. Male nurse who gave my 4 year old the Covid test was friendly. I'm not certain he went far enough up her nose for the test, but I'm not a nurse so I trust the process.

name: Tara Lang
text: Went in for a antigens test. They tried to talk us out of it to do another test that cost 2x more and refused to put through insurance!  They even crossed out the Test the Dr ordered on the official order and put the test they wanted to run on it.  Very unprofessional.  We walked out and went to Labcorp.

name: Will Grimmett
text: Friendly Staff, Quick and Easy. Got in and out of the office fast

name: Vicki Yarbrough
text: Easy in and out. Courteous staff.

name: Mark Zakutney
text: I appreciate how accommodating ARC was on short notice.  Friendly folks and extremely helpful.

name: Cherry Moody
text: Had a great experience at ARC point labs!  They took great care of my family!

name: Daniel Topping
text: Fast friendly efficient service provided for a COVID test. Thank you so much.

name: Deidre Lesley
text: Staff very friendly and professional. No long wait times. I would definitely use them again.

name: Bobby Reuse
text: Short wait, super nice people. In/out quick. Highly recommend.

name: Jacob Pearce
text: Had a problem with a drug test done. Management went above and beyond to take care of me after the initial issue.

name: Deborah Grant
text: Great experience- friendly staff was very responsive to my needs! A very well run office!

name: Thad Mickler
text: Friendly and outgoing staff. Speedy results. Very positive experience.

name: Amanda Franklin
text: They were easy to get an appointment with, quickly got us back when we arrived, and got our results back same day. Would definitely recommend them and use them again.

name: Tracie Stricklin
text: Quick service...I was in and out in around 10 minutes. Professional and friendly staff.

name: Wendy Hartley-Gregerson
text: Fast in and out. Staff very friendly.

name: Bama Grad
text: They went above and beyond to get us quick results for our trip.  Thank you do much

name: Louis Dina
text: Courteous, efficient, Safe, wearing masks and scheduled our appointment to maintain social distancing, reasonable prices. Mailed our samples off and they arrived at the laboratory right on schedule.

name: Doug Preston
text: Excellent service and staff

name: Harrison Brannon
text:
Timely friendly professional
Testing with results expedited to our cellphones

name: Jason Hogan
text: Quick, reliable screening services!

name: Lindsay Walker
text: A little expensive, but great service and timely results.

name: Stephen Anderson
text: Professional, fast, friendly and efficient.

name: Barry Thomas
text: Fast simple and very helpful staff.

name: David Fowler
text: Fast, friendly and great communication, highly recommended !!!

name: Josh Hillman
text: They were very professional and quick.

name: Gabriel Velez
text: Very nice and on point I was in and out in no time very professional.

name: D Thorn
text: Highly recommended. An extremely high standard of professionalism.

name: Denesha Cuneo
text: Very professional. Didn’t skip a beat to provide education and make me feel comfortable.

name: David Tosch
text: Very professional and quick.

name: Sherri Dunn
text: I took my son here for lab work. We were in and out quickly! Great customer service. I highly recommend!

name: Holly Adams
text: Fast and great service!

name: Vincent Dichiara
text: Very willing to accommodate.

name: Andrew Jernigan
text: Great team, amazing service and even better pricing. Highly recommend.

name: altaf virani
text: good and fast service

name: Lula Taylor
text: There are the best in and out

name: Tereca Spain
text: The people are very nice. I don’t like the way the sign in is done. Today I had to help an elderly gentleman sign in with the the machine. I like people check in.

name: Carrie Madrigal
text: If I could give it 0 stars I would. Terrible service and their 1 hour lunch is actually an 1 1/2 lunch.   Needs reprimanding and accountability desperately!!!@

name: Lane Widick
text:
Serious lack of space and waiting area. They need more workers to get folks through quicker.

The people inside are really kind. It’s not their fault. 5 stars for staff. 0 stars for everything else.

name: Savannah Jones
text: Outside door wasn't open, had to walk around the other side of the building. We get to Labcorp after nobody answered the phone all week, nobody there at opening. We finally go to digitally check-in when we look at a sign and an associate opened the door 45 minutes after opening. They do not do drug screen testing on Saturdays, even though it allowed us online to schedule it for Saturday.

name: Joshua Newsun
text: For some reason the take over a hour and a half for lunch seems alittle rediculas... along with some one being late to the desk when there lunch is supposed to be over...just dont come unless u have all day.

name: ERICA GULLEY
text: Fix your website. Why allow people to make appointments for services that you don’t even provide on Saturday????

name: elsha fornefeld
text: They were efficient, humorous, and it was painless except a slight pinch. Will go there every time from now on.

name: John Sheffield
text: Posted hours are until 4:00pm CST. I arrive today at 3:40pm as the lab is closing for the day. I was told by a staff member that they do not accept walk-ins after a certain "time" to avoid OT. Therefore they would not see me for these labs.  If this is their "policy", it is not publicly posted on their window next to the operating hours.  Unacceptable and unprofessionalism by the staff.

name: Lisa Woodall
text: I have very tiny veins and Labcorp's technicians usually find a good one on the 1st try.  Quick and painless!  Good job!!!

name: Tim Tripp
text: Fast, professional, efficient.  Make an online appointment, it goes a lot faster and it helps them keep you from waiting.

name: L Graves
text: My first experience with LabCorp was a 4 hour long blood test. I was treated professionally by very pleasant people. Making pleasant visit out of this long ordeal. Thank You Ashly and April.

name: Dave M
text:
Staff is very good
The wait is ridiculously long
Just looked at Labcorp profits apparently horribly mismanaged probably the reason they are understaffed

name: Grant Stephens
text: LabCorp is just a small section of the building it lies within, but I only had to wait 5 minutes to take my drug test. I arrived just before 9 AM, and despite being a few minutes early, I was allowed to take my drug test a minute or two early. I only had to wait 5 minutes, and water is provided in the lobby if needed for the test.

name: Patricia Green
text: I have been here one time for a blood test. My experience was that I was treated very courteously by the efficient staff and the visit went very quickly.

name: Charles McCraw
text: I have dealt with this location on two separate ocassions and both times i received swift, curtious service.

name: Kenneth Johnson
text: First time visit and the nurses were very helpful and friendly

name: Cathrine -Cate Summer
text: Wow just had one of the worst sticks in my life this young man in a dirty Med scrub stuck me so hard that I was feeling it 5 minutes later.  The whole office appeared to be very run down

name: Kay Wilson
text: Staff is professional, areas are clean but the process is extremely slow at this location.

name: Mike Campbell
text: You ca forget getting them on a phone.

name: scott mcfarlen
text: Good job

name: Justin Soeung
text: Slow

name: Ashley T.
text: Really quick in and out. Woman who helped me and did my test was nice and quick. I came in with 3 others behind me and they seemed to get called in not long after. Reviews had me worried for nothing

name: Jake Geveden
text: Horrible, horrible, horrible, horrible experience. They refused to do my test and give me results because the color of my the container I was given and provided back to them was the wrong color.  I am so absolutely frustrated by this awful experience

name: Amy Wedlund
text: I had a great experience at the Montclair location. I highly recommend making an appointment. It is easy to park, easy to check-in, and the staff was incredibly nice and efficient.

name: Amanda J Vaughn
text: The personnel have very little people skills and act like robots. The tech barked orders at me, didn't explain anything, and acted annoyed when I asked for clarification. This was by far my worst experience, just use a different location whenever possible.

name: Stephanie Keller
text: Been to two other Labcorp with no issues. Go to this one and had nothing but problems and it seemed like no one would listen to what I had to say. Then I had an issue after I left and called the office. No one would answer the phone. I have now left a few voicemails over the last few days and they refuse to call me back.

name: Darian Bester
text: No need to make an appointment because they do not follow them. Currently 30 min after my appt time.

name: Sarah McClure
text:
This location is CLOSED. I made an appointment online a week or 2 ago. I showed up and checked in online through the “wait where you’re comfortable” option, where they text you when they’re ready for you to come in. so I waited in my car. After 40 min I decide it’s taking too long. When I get inside the building, they have a sign on their office saying they are temporarily closed?!
That’s fine, except I was never notified of this change after scheduling my appt. Confused as to why they would not inform me of this or why I was allowed to check in for my appointment that apparently didn’t exist anymore the day of. Huge waste of time. Very disappointed in the lack of professionalism and consideration for others.

name: Jessica Dallow
text: Terrible service. Made an appointment, claimed I hadn’t done the proper paperwork so had no information. Rude and unhelpful. Go somewhere else.

name: Gabrielle Pass
text: Employees very rude and unprofessional. Would not recommend.

name: Jamie Polk
text: Absolutely the best service and the lady who did my lab work was the best

name: Daniel Bolus
text: Hours are actually 7:30 to 4:00 Monday through Friday. Tasha was fantastic. In and out with my drug test. I would recommend getting there at around 7:25 so you can get in and out as one of the first people.

name: Megan Waldrop
text: I went here for an employer drug test. I made an appointment for 11 am and arrived about 10:30. I was in and out before my appointment time. Very friendly and professional staff. 10/10 recommend this facility.

name: Jimmy Harris
text: My visit was very pleasant. The wait from front desk to lobby area to in a chair was only about 12 minutes. The staff was really nice and the young lady Tasha, who drew my blood, I didn't feel any pain and she has a wonderful personality......Beautiful person. #Great job Labcorp/Montclair Road

name: John Newton
text: Staff is extremely rude. Seems like they have no idea what’s going on. Avoid going here at all cost. Appointments made online do not matter.

name: David Seidel
text: They have a computer check in, which did not get my info.  So after 20 minutes they asked if the could help me.. then had me check in on the computer again.  Construction in front means you come in thru a side door.

name: A Google User 8
text: I had a great experience considering the circumstances (getting my blood drawn). The lady at the front desk was really friendly to me, then she took my blood and did a great job!! I'll use this facility again if I ever have to again!

name: Austin Green
text: There are no hours for this location. I had to go to yelp and yellowpages to find out the closing time to only discover when I got there that they close earlier than what was referenced. They close at 4 and I got there at 4:05 and even explained that they have no hours of operation up and they wouldn’t not let me take a drug test. For reference the hours are 7am- 4pm and be prepared for terrible service

name: LaToya Maiden
text: The receptionist Lakeisha is rude. The other ladies that sat around her are also rude. I said hello how are you and she basically dismissed me and I  said hello again mind you there are four women sitting in this room and not one of them said hello, how can I help you. Finally the older lady in the room said how can I help you. They're not professional, There is know customer service period and they seem to be angry women by there tones...

name: Face Card
text: Employees are really rude. Customer Service skills should be a priority.!!!! No matter what the field of work is. A simple smile and or saying Good Morning takes a mere split second.

name: April L. Butler
text: Came in for a pre-employment screening with my registration sheet and ID, as I was told to in the LabCorp email.  I was told by the person at the desk once I signed in that she told me in a short tone that she'd call me back up in a minute.  After 30 minutes, she then decides to call me up and take my form and ID (no idea why she couldn't have taken the time to do that when I signed in because no one else was waiting and she was literally just sitting there.  From there, it took another hour, AN HOUR, to even be called back for the screening.  It is absolutely ridiculous to have to wait that long to complete a screening that literally takes 5 minutes.  Changing jobs is hard enough without making your current employer aware by taking a 2 hour lunch break!  They need to reorganize and replace their current staff with ones that understand how hospitality works.

name: K P
text: Very good experience.  Lottie was wonderful, very friendly and helpful!  She also was able to draw the blood painlessly!  Will be back!!

name: Bham Onion
text:
Went there today expecting a issue and they did not let me down.  No sign in sheet so the person keeping the seat warm asked me,  not for my name but for my cell number and someone would call me.
30 minutes later when I still had not been called I went back to the counter to find 3 seat warmers who were all amazed that the previous seat warmer had not done anything past taking my number.

Who runs that place?

name: Joseph Butts
text:
Got a set of cultures done and the prices where:
Aerobic culture: $82
Anaerobic: $160
Sensitivity: $60

How in the world to people pay for this without insurance. That’s ridiculous. This is why people try avoiding the doctors office.

name: Chase Bower
text: The ladies at the front desk are very rude and will not try to help you. They looked for every reason not to see me and did not try to work with me at all. Every time I asked a question she was condescending and unpleasant.

name: ricdady77 Stewart
text: Getting simple access to a person is very difficult. I work at a hospice and wanted to pick up supply for blood draw and spent 30 minutes on the phone and still was not able to reach a person to arrange pick up of tubes for lab draw.

name: zack haynes
text: I have never left a review of any kind on any business but I just felt like I had to say how horrible this place was. Waited 2 hours got skipped in line several times when I finally went to the desk they said “oh we’re sorry you’ll be next” this place is a JOKE. I wouldn’t recommend this place to my worst enemy.

name: B B
text: Long wait, inconvenient hours, and rude unprofessional staff. Botched my screen and had to go to another branch. Totally unacceptable.

name: Shirley Edwards
text: VERY UNKIND AND UNPROFESSIONAL PEOPLE AT THIS LOCATION ... I WILL NOT  GO INTO DETAIL BUT I PASSED MY DRIG TEST THANK GOD ...

name: Carly Speeg
text: The worker of this clinic was absolutely awful.  She was extremely rude to my husband who is preparing for school.  Next time we will go elsewhere.

name: Graham Pointer
text: I really like the people who work there. They always treat me fair, and they respect my time.

name: Arthur Heraud
text:
An hour wait in the lobby. Finally it took me 30 seconds to leave a urine sample for school

Technicians demeanor was that of a probation officer

Maybe they were just understaffed but regardless

name: Tonya Lawson
text: How hard is it to have a human answer the phone?!?

name: Skylar Alexander-Brown
text: Don't bother making an appointment

name: Madison Jenkins
text: They were very rude and extremely disorganized. They do not greet you or make eye contact and no smiles anywhere. Very demanding ! Would not reccommend this place

name: Brian Hamel
text: I would run from any Stopwatch Urgent Care Center.   They simply will not answer the phone.....period.   My daughter went in for a strep, pay her co=-pay and we weren't aware of any other charges.  today we received a notice from a notice from a collect agency.  No other communications, not details and Stopwatch WILL NOT ANSWER THE PHONE.....  just the worse customer service.   Please go to any other Urgent Care Center.   There are just too many other options available!!!

name: M Stevens
text: Very nice, convenient urgent care. Quick in and out. Comfortable waiting room has cushion chairs. Very clean environment. The staff from reception to doctors and nurses are friendly. Definitely recommend their services to anyone in need of medical attention.

name: James Traylor Jr.
text: I was billed for 89.00 when I already have been billed for 60.00 on my visit.( with the understanding that my insurance will not cover it)  and my card is being charged when I did not authorized it. When I was charged 60.00 andI to signed a merchant receipt stating that I authorize this charge of 60.00 to my card. I was told that the 60.00 was the full amount I had to pay because and I quote " no insurance in Alabama covers physicals so it's 60.00." I have been to the doctor enough to know how it works and I work with money as well. First of all if 60.00 is the full price of the physical without insurance then that should been the full amount. Second you can not charge  a customer's credit card without their permission. It maybe the policy of the clinic but if the customer has not signed the policy/billing agreement that their card will be charge with additional fees , then you are pretty much stealing money! Stopwatch Urgent Care is my first and last time dealing with you. I would be rather be sick for a month than to put up with crooks who lie and steal hardworking citizens money!  Oh and whoever I spoke to on the phone at the front desk, please send her to customer service training because she is very rude and unprofessional. If she is that bitter please ask her to stay at home. We are in pandemic and people are ill and hurting . No one needs that type of negativity when trying to be treated at an Urgent Care.

name: Psyche Wilburn
text:
This place is a sham! Get your money and get out the door. Doctor took seconds with my daughter. Said he’d call in a prescription. (Her appointment was before lunch.) By 5 pm the pharmacy hadn’t received the prescription. I called multiple times the next day and could not get anyone in the phone. Finally, after a 39 minute wait on hold, the woman told me  there was not a prescription ordered and that particular doctor she saw could only call in it and he wasn’t there today.
So....daughter still felling crummy, I paid a copay, and I wasted over an hour on hold.....

name: Charles Elmore
text: I went there today due to a painful back injury. Receptionist & nurse were professional and the N-practitioner did a great job analyzing, making recommendations, and prescribing the meds. The only reason I gave this place 4 stars is because the facilities can use some updating & cleaning. If needed, I'll use them again.

name: Lisa Crittenden Chappell
text: This place is one of the cleanest places I have been inside in a very long time! Not only can you smell the clean you can clearly see the cleanliness when you walk in the door. The staff here is Awesome! They are very friendly and nice but most of all they get you in and out in a very timely manner and are still very friendly with everything!

name: David Gapp
text: Stay away from this place! They absolutely will NOT pick up the phone for the life of them, they take weeks to give you results if they can even remember what test they gave you. Just save yourself more pain and avoid this place.

name: Tam And
text: When it came to the work I needed to be done, it was handled good. However, they never answer the phone and the voice-mail stays full so you can't leave a call back number. I asked multiple times what my costs would cover having no insurance. I was given a price and was still billed by an outside company even though I was told that the fee, which wasn't small, would be all I would pay. $550 for simple testing. Save your money and time.

name: Brittany Stroud
text:
Called at 6:30 this evening not feeling well wanting a co-vid test.  Had an apt at 8:32 the same night. The Dr. Was super easy to relate to.  Very down to earth! Her nurse was great as well.  I had my test results within 15 minutes.

The only reason im not leaving 5 stars is because when I arrived no one was at the desk.  I stood up there for 10-15minutes before the lady came to check me in.  I almost left but im glad I didnt!

Thank you Stop Watch!

name: June Owens
text: Reserved my spot in advance via the website. They got me in and out quickly.  Always a positive experience. While you may not get through on the phone, they are diligently working with the patients in their office in front of them.

name: Paula Jordan
text: I went in for a COVID test. I walked out in less than 40 minutes with the results in my hand. Staff was super nice. Nurse Practitioner Carrie was awesome! I am new to the area so this was my 1st visit and will definitely return. The most convenient part was being able to fill out the necessary paperwork online which cut down on wait time and exposure to other patients. My appointment was at 11:36 and I was in a room at 11:38!!

name: Patrick Hodgins
text: I would give a zero if I could. Made an appointment for a sports physical 2 days in advance. Get there and told it will be an hour wait.. Two hours later, still haven't been seen. Now our kid is missing her tryouts. This is beyond unprofessional. Why did I need an appointment? I strongly recommend not using this location.

name: Ray Day
text:
Absolutely horrible experience for COVID rapid test. I made a reservation for an appointment, arrived 10 minutes before as they requested and checked in.

I, then, waited for 45 minutes in a room with 0 air movement and limited distancing, and the best part - they allowed a person who had COVID to sit in the waiting room with everyone to cough and wheeze everywhere. I came to be tested - NOT to get COVID. The worst part? They allowed him to sit between everyone while coughing everywhere for over 20 minutes before he left.

Irresponsible, irrecusable, and wrong. I have been tested elsewhere which was 100% safer than this and more efficient with much better procedures. 1) Do not put non-COVID people and COVID people in the same room for 45 minutes. 2) Allow people to wait in their cars and receive a notice when they are ready to be seen. 3) Allow people to be emailed results on demand rather than waiting in the office for a print-out.

As a healthcare facility, there is so much wrong with what happened. You all endangered everyone sitting in that room, where everyone now should quarantine again. I can only expect that this has happened to many before, as this cannot be the first time you allowed this.

name: Coca cola Fiend
text: The worst part of my experience here began Monday night when I called in to make an appointment. The receptionist on the phone was very rude and dismissive. I made my appointment and came in at the specified time. I was told by the nurse who treated me that I would have some test results within three days, being Saturday and still having not heard anything I stopped by the location. Lo and behold it's the same receptionist who was on the phone, her name is Sebrina and she should not be dealing with the public if she gets aggravated with one asking questions. She kept dodging my question until finally I told her to just answer my question. Demeanor is everything and your body language and attitude depicts that you should not be working this job. Learn to do your job and be respectful. Thank you.

name: Shaneeka McClendon
text: I would not go to ANY location! Stay away from this place! I paid a copay and still got billed! What's the point of making an appointment if I'm going to be waiting 2 hours after my appointment!

name: Kapponita Murray
text: They had me on hold for a long time .. They neva answer and always tellin me to call da next day n den say Sum else dey bad business to me ..

name: Edward Borenstein
text:
While the service was quick and friendly, none of the three receptionists working were wearing masks.

For a healthcare facility that requires all clients who enter to wear masks, the disregard for following that same policy is hypocritical and disappointing.

name: Danielle Scott
text: This was my 1st visit and I came in for a Covid test. The staff was very polite and even tried to work as fast as they could so that I would know my results as soon as possible. They were very kind and I was extremely pleased with the experience!

name: Gail Griffin
text: This was a very clean office, the staff was very professional and I was seen in a timely manner

name: Elle L
text: Viengxay Malavong is the worst doctor my son and I have ever experienced. This was our first time meeting him and it will be the last. He is awful, unprofessional, nonchalant, rude, and he is a liar. I literally thought someone had snuck in off the street to pose as a doctor. The nurse recognized my frustration with his unkind actions and was able to assist me and my child.

name: Susan Gorham
text: Staff was efficient and courteous I would reccomend we were seen and out within 30 minutes

name: Chris B
text: I have had amazing experiences here in the past, but recently I didn't feel well and made an appointment for a covid test for the next day. The wait was a little long but they were really busy so im not upset by that. But I went there with my symptoms and the doc saw me very rapidly and came back and said I prescribed you a Z-pack, your good to go. I informed the doc that I have at risk friends and family and I would like a covid test and after that I quickly ushered out and I asked for an excuse before leaving. I was never given a document or anything with test results. I go to the pharmacy and the drug I pick up was not a Z-pack it was just a general antibiotic. Felt uneasy about the experience and went somewhere for a second opinion. Turns out I had viral influenza type A(antibiotics ended up being almost useless)

name: Kate Hood
text: Don’t go here for COVID testing. Although the doctor is very nice, I’ve been waiting over a week to receive my results. I had to take off work and self quarantine just in case. Losing a week of pay while you’re waiting for your results is hard when you’re a recent graduate. They told me I would receive results in 2-5 days and that the new lab they use is pretty quick. They don’t answer the phone, so don’t try calling. I went to ask the receptionist what the deal was and she didn’t know what was going on and was not helpful at all.

name: Mercedes Terry
text: Receptionist was great! The staff in the back are horrible! Very unprofessional and no manners. Can hear them discussing patient info outside the exam room! I can hear them discussing how the requirements/process for a COVID swab is too much work. Please go to American Family Care is Tiger town, because this place is freaking horrible.

name: Max Woolley
text: Single worst experience of my life. Waited over a week and a half to hear my results for a covid test (never got them) only to find out that my test was lost. I had to drive back up there to find this out as I received no call and no one would answer the phone from my repeated calls. Then I was called a liar When asked about the date I was tested. If this place had the only cure to the plague I would just die rather then try and deal with them. Save yourself a lot of trouble and go literally anywhere else.

name: Marty Nelson
text: Easy online scheduling. I arrived early and was quickly brought in for testing. Staff was friendly and attentive. A great example of quality customer service. Thanks to all the staff!

name: Queen H .R.M.
text: The front lobby was being sanitized, every 🪑 chair to include the front counter. The nurse was awesome. Everyone was so polite and professional.

name: Jimmy Bishop (Captain1Cav3man)
text:
Cancels covid testing appointment after ten minutes of not being there with no call or text.

They do not have automatic text set up so if you have to go. Go as soon as it's your appointment time.

Will not pick up the phone.which was why I was late. I was trying to make sure there wasnt anything I needed to do.

What a waste of time.

Edit- after reading more comments about this place it seems this is a habit that's started happening very recently and prior this place was decent. Alot of tests have been lost and no one will answer the phone.

name: Amanda Hensley
text: I do not recommend this test site. I originally gave them a 10 because it was fairly fast and courteous service on Sunday, June 21. However since then we’ve received mixed or no Covid test results. I was called Wednesday and told the swab didn’t contain enough so I’d have to come back in. That’s not possible because I live in Atlanta and was only testing there out of convenience while I was visiting over the weekend.  So basically a waste of my time and the clinics resources.  My youngest daughter received a call Thursday saying her results were negative. My other daughter is yet to receive a call and no one answers when we call them.  I was also supposedly tested for antibodies but haven’t received those results yet either as of Saturday, June 27.  A drive thru test site near our house in Atlanta is fast, convenient and you get results the next day.

name: Emily Hanner
text:
TERRIBLE experience today... will never be back to this location. The staff was rude, the lady behind the front desk mumbling the whole time, and the doctor came in, said “negative” while handing me my COVID results, and walked out the door. I had to call out to him to tell him I needed to be checked as well as ask him if he was, in fact, the doctor.

After I walked out of the room, I asked for his name, and he told me but I didn’t understand him. I still don’t know if he was a doctor or what prescription he prescribed me.

Unacceptable to have such rude, unkind people in customer service... especially at a medical office where no one comes in feeling good.

name: Amber Foster
text: Went in to get COVID test for my son. We were taken back almost immediately and seen in less than 5 minutes.  It took about 15-20 minutes to get the negative test result, but we were still in/out in about half an hour.

name: Lisa Downey
text: Fast and friendly, appts available for any schedule. Got in and out quickly, will definitely go back. While i was there the secretary was constantly answering the phone to help other clients.

name: Samantha Smith
text: Even tho what I needed wasn’t Covid related they saw me within 20 minutes and got me in and out within 30 very pleased!

name: bonni davidson
text: This urgent care facility is clean and bright throughout. The staff is efficient and caring. I received the most painless shot I’ve ever had! Great job! This was my first visit and experienced almost no wait time to be seen. I appreciate that the center offers extended hours. Thank you all for your excellent care.

name: Nicole Wright
text: I was in and out. Staff friendly. Compassionate and showed they like their job! A place i know to use when i need medical care can't make it to my Primary Doctor

name: Poo Kat
text: Very nice clean place ,where the people and the service was great. Thanks

name: Nelson Muthanji
text: Quick helpful and efficient service.

name: Maggie Richard
text: Would not recommend if you’re wanting to get a COVID-19 test. We made an appointment earlier that day to get tested and the online form said that we would receive a text message when it was our turn to come inside. We showed up a few minutes before our appointment time. After waiting for an hour, we had not received the text message, so we went inside to find out what was going on. That’s when they took our name down. We then waited another hour or so and were finally seen. It has been 9 days since we got the test and we have not heard anything from them. I have not been to this location for any other medical need, but I would not recommend going here for a Covid-19 test.  There are other places that can get you results the same day.

name: Michael Cohan
text: Agree with prior post on COVID testing.  Don't go there.  Should know when they do test out of steel box in a Walmart parking lot that it's not going to go well.  They promise 24-72 hr turnaround.  Not even close.  Son can't return to work (or do much else) without test results.  HORRIBLE customer service.

name: Zangelia Dowdell
text: I had Covid in March and at the time there was this doctor  named Dr. Malvong... he was amazing... he treated me very nice and was really concerned about me but he left like 3 or 4 weeks after that...I was still feeling bad after that when I tried to go back Dr. Malvong was gone and the new doctor was very rude and was not concerned about me at all...I would not recommend them to anybody unless Dr. Malvong is there

name: Rebecca Yacko
text: All of the staff were so sweet. I really appreciated Abby, NP who made me feel comfortable throughout my visit. She was super sweet and personable. I will def go to this urgent care again if needed in the future.

name: Tara Webb
text:
I wish I had something nice to say, as any good person would do.
Here’s the situation:
They have never answered the phone since I, my sister, and mother were tested for COVID-19 after we were exposed to a person who was positive and became very ill. My sister and mother are both immunocompromised. We filled out the online form and followed the directions where to go. They were closed, no sign. Finally got to get tested the next day after going there in person and that was 10 days ago. I called every day after the 3rd day and let the phone ring for several minutes until the system would hang up on me. We are still sitting here “quarentining” for their lack of professionalism.
I called 528-SICK and was told we could not be re-tested since we are already awaiting results. I am beside myself.
This is the worst system I have had the displeasure of entering in all my 49 years.
You have been warned.
I would have selected 0 stars, but google doesn’t have that as an option.

name: Jamie Johnson
text: I recently went to Stopwatch in Opelika twice over the course of two weeks with flu symptoms (which turned out to be the flu) and afterward a bacterial infection following it (which was no fault of their treatment). The wait time was incredibly short, all of the doctors and nurses I encountered were nice and helpful, and they did an exceptional job of treating me and helping to get past this crud. I would definitely recommend them to anyone in the area.

name: Natalie Johnson
text: Quick waiting times enjoyed the interaction with the professional and friendly staff.

name: Mike Phaneuf
text: Don't answer the phone ever. Don't keep patients in the loop of test results. After a week of waiting found out was positive for covid19. Told me to stay quantined for 10 days from test date. My wife tested the same day. Still no word for her. They won't answer the phone. We have sent emails and tried call not luck. Guess they just want us to show up.  Doesn't seem right or fair to others. Really disappointed in the professioism of the staff. Getting no answers is really disappointing

name: Alexis B
text: Nobody ever answers the phone.... I’ve been calling and calling. Maybe they will see this. I had my wife tested here for covid today and the girl that did her testing was very aggressive so it caused severe nose bleed and also bleeding out the mouth when we left there so I had to rush her to the e.r.!!!

name: Doug Wong
text: Reserved appointment online.  Wait time was less than 10 minutes.  Got checked for flu and strep.  Was examined by NP and received instructions on self care at home.  Patient declined the offered steroid shot.  Came back a few days later after symptoms worsened in the mornings.   Minimal wait time. Was examined again.  Patient agreed to  receive the steroid shot.   Received scripts to address the worsening symptoms and instructions on when to follow up if necessary.  Staff were kind and efficient.  Would come back again if necessary.

name: Barbara Hoyle
text: I went to the Opelika site for the COVID-19 test. Everyone was very friendly and professional. I was taken in and tested in a very timely manner.

name: Gracie Rudd
text: Worst urgent care in town. Never answers the phone, not helpful, lazy, etc. used them several times. Also, don’t even try getting tested for COVID here. Been waiting 10 days for results, and can’t even get them to answer the phone to see if they have them. don’t even waste your time trying to deal with them.

name: Doug Wong
text: Reserved appointment online.  Wait time was less than 10 minutes.  Got checked for flu and strep.  Was examined by NP and received instructions on self care at home.  Patient declined the offered steroid shot.  Came back a few days later after symptoms worsened in the mornings.   Minimal wait time. Was examined again.  Patient agreed to  receive the steroid shot.   Received scripts to address the worsening symptoms and instructions on when to follow up if necessary.  Staff were kind and efficient.  Would come back again if necessary.

name: Grass
text: So my brother and mother went to get tested for corona on monday June 22nd and they said it would take 3 to 4 days. On the 4th day they never called and we tried calling them and they didnt answer. So on the 5th day on a friday we went and they said the results would be in next monday. Well low and behold its wendsday July 1st and they still havnt called. Oncr again we tried calling and they havnt answered. Its a waste of time, money, resources, and risks others lives cause there was a corona outbreak at my brothers workplace and im working at starbucks so if he has it and we dont know i probably have it and am spreading it. Absolutely horrible screw these people.

name: Rachel Adams
text: The service was fast and the office was clean. I was able to get in and out within 30 minutes. HOWEVER, what they didn't tell/warn me is that my Blue Cross Blue Shield is "out of their network." They know they are not covered, but failed to let me know that before proceeding with the visit. So, even though I have premiere health insurance I received a bill for $300 yesterday for service in August. The doctor literally did no tests, labs etc. and wrote a simple eye drop prescription. All they had to do was let me know they weren't covered and I would have probably continued with the visit, otherwise it is just deceitful. So, one star for lack of transparency.

name: Jack Spencer
text: Still waiting for covid test results, you can try calling to ask them what’s going on, but I just got out on hold and then never got through. Waste of time and effort, get tested somewhere else.

name: Matt Lowman
text: The doctors/nurses were friendly, but good luck calling them. They will not answer. Been waiting on my results for 6 days so far.

name: Abby Kuhn
text: The absolute worst. I took a covid test in a Saturday and was told I would hear back in 48 hours. I waited 3 days... called back and was told it was 3-5 business days. They told me to call back Friday.  I did... no results, no answers. They took my name and info. They said they would call right back. They never did. I called again at 5:30. They passed by call around to 4 different ladies. Horrible! No answers. Huge waste of time!

name: Joanne Baker
text: This was truly my best experience ever with an Urgent Care Medical Facility.. The courtesy shown upon check in was great.... The genuine concern and compassion shown by nurse and doctor made my visit all the more pleasant.... Thank you for the service provided... Quick and thorough... Fever is broken.. I feel so much better..  You have my high recommendations.....

name: Keith Vickery
text: Great staff!  It wasn't the worst way to spend a Friday night...ya know, all things considered. Thanks for helping me get better.

name: Farooq
text:
I have been there couple of times and the best urgent care in Aurburn, Opelika area. Marcy is the best person, i think she has a great personality and her behavior is very polite, say Hi to her. The doctors and staff are very courteous. Slots can be booked according to your availability. They don't rip you off like other urgent cares.
I would highly recommend this place.

name: Danielle Carabello
text: The Nurse Practitioner was wonderful! She took the time to listen to me and make sure all of my problems were thoroughly documented. She was also gentle with the strep test and quick CBC. The facilities are nice, clean, and comforting.  However, my only complaint is that the doctor I saw seemed like he didn't want to see me. He rushed through everything, including listening to my respiration. Although he knew what was going on based on my strep test and symptoms, It would have been nice to feel like I was more throughly looked at, especially if the medicine does not clear up what is going on with me.

name: Tammy Kolb
text: We were here from FL and our 17 sliced his finger open and needed sutures. They got us in and out quickly. The staff was very friendly.

name: Jaime Burnham
text: Terrible experience, will not be going back.  Staff was not considerate and I left totally embarassed and in tears.

name: Sarah-Callin Moat
text: Wonderful! 😀 We were in and out with our 2 year old at 9pm within 30 min. We were even sent over for an X-ray that evening!

name: Frank Miller
text: Very professional and great service. They listened to you and helped you with your issues and took time to take care and help. Left with feeling much better and went to pharmacy to pick up medications to help with infection.  Very good.

name: Savannah Sims
text: 10/10 would recommend to anyone! I thought I had a q-tip stuck in my ear, and wouldn’t be able to make it until 15 minutes before closing due to my work hours. They waited on me, setting them back from going home on time, just to tell me that there was not a q-tip-end stuck in my ear. 😅 Thank you, guys! Sorry I kept you over!

name: Jill Senn
text: Very polite and empathetic to your illness.  Dr.Perry's bedside manner was very personable and actually listened to what I had to say? And the wait time was not even 5 minutes and it wasn't because they weren't busy because they were! I would recommend this clinic to anyone! Good job all the staff members at this clinic! I will definitely be going back if I have to but hopefully I won't! 👍🏼😁

name: Sandra Shuman
text: I am very disappointed in stopwatch urgent Care Saturday afternoon at 1:00 p.m. on September 19th I brought my 15-year-old in with a severe ear infection and in pain I talked to the receptionist and she  instructed me that they only see people by appointment she gave us an appointment for 6:12 that evening when we arrived  there was another patient waiting there her appointment was at 6:06 the office was closed it closes at 5:00 p.m. on Saturday when the receptionist gave me the appointment I questioned her I said at 6:12 this evening she told me yes ma'am absolutely 6:12 tonight when I arrived I was completely bewildered and so was the other patient I can't believe this happened to us consequently I had to bring my 15-year-old to the emergency room that evening on the way home her nose started bleeding and her condition worsened I did not want to bring her to the emergency room for a sinus infection and an ear infection but since I could get anyone to see her I had no alternatives I am very very disappointed in the whole situation.

name: Pam Gregory
text: Everyone was kind, caring, and efficient. I was called to the back before I even completed my paperwork. My doctor was personable and took the time to listen and get to know me. I will recommend Stopwatch Urgent care to my friends!

name: Meri Mixon
text: NEVERRRR answer their phone ! I’ve called on many different occasions & they just can’t seem to answer the phone , no matter the times of day !

name: Giovanna Valle-Ramos
text: Amazing service! The staff was very friendly and attentive. They did quick blood work and had me in and out in no time. I’ve had bad experiences with other urgent care clinics in the area. Safe to say, I will be going to StopWatch from now on.

name: Cathy Cason
text: Excellent urgent care center.   I would highly recommend them to anyone.   Very professional and efficient.

name: Kendall Holmes
text: Terrible service. Waited an hour for an appointment and then waited another 2 hours after checking in. Went to the front desk to see what was going on and the desk clerk said I never checked in even though I had a text on my phone to prove I did check in. Then proceeded to tell me I’d have to wait another 3 hours till the next appointment. 🙄She was very rude. Will not be going back.

name: Janice Lofland
text: We have had only positive experiences at Stopwatch! We are usually seen within 10 minutes of our arrival. Very kind and courteous staff. We will be back! We love that they are open later and on the weekends. I can’t think of any negatives, just positives!

name: Maya N Maree Abrams
text: I went in to Stopwatch UC and the service was awesome.  I wasn't feeling good but the staff was very attentive, genuine,  and made my visit comfortable.  They were fast and all showed positive attitudes.

name: Christy Ruff
text: It was a pretty quick trip, service was good and it kept me from having to go to the ER.

name: Larry B
text: Went by The Stopwatch on Sunday morning and I was very pleased with the care I received. They were very prompt and attentive to my needs and I was there for nearly an hour which I was very pleased with. Hopefully I won’t need there services any time soon, but if the need arises I will definitely stop back by

name: Debbie Allen
text: The entire staff at Stop Watch is wonderful. No one wants to be ill, but when you need medical attention, these professionals take such good care of you. From the moment you enter, you feel their compassion, know you’re in excellent hands and that they will do their best to take care of your needs. Thank you, Stop Watch for being here for us.

name: pkjarrett
text: I had a great experience at Stopwatch! I went in because I couldn’t get in to see my regular doc. I was taken back in less then 5 min. After vitals, went straight to exam room and waited again, less then 5 min. The doctor I saw was young, smart and took great care of me. The only reason for not giving 5 stars was because my husband said the exam room floor wasn’t very clean. I’ll be honest, I felt terrible and didn’t notice. I was very happy with my experience there and would definitely recommend!

name: dani rosener
text: It’s sad when your young child needs stitches; but the staff tonight was more than amazing. They were patient, loving, and understanding. We were seen quickly, and cared for well. We appreciate all you do!!! Thank you!

name: Debi Moody
text: Very pleasant experience. The staff was very friendly and very helpful. If I never get a PCP then I'm always going to go here for my medical help. Thank y'all so very much

name: Erin Scott
text: I was in and out in about 30 minutes. No one in front of me in the waiting room. This was my 1st visit here and I did all my paperwork online before I arrived. Dr Adams was very kind, attentive and helpful. And he was easy on the eyes. Very good experience. I don’t use urgent cares often but I needed one that day.

name: Shaquellar Woodyard
text: Been waiting a week for COVID test and haven’t heard anything I will never use this urgent care again.

name: Halie Davis
text: I have been to Stopwatch in Opelika several times, and my experiences have been wonderful. From the front desk staff to the doctors I have seen, every one has been so kind and helpful. Also, the wait times couldn't be better...in and out in less than 30 minutes! Give them a try...you won't regret it!

name: Ian Baas
text: Poor business practices.

name: Noah Edward Chamblee
text: Service was that quick overall. The doctor was great, although didn’t really listen to the fact that I had just told him my kid had the same thing a month ago and maybe needed a different antibiotic. 🤷‍♀️ Otherwise, I would go back if necessary.

name: Linda Cook
text: This was our first visit to Stopwatch Urgent Care in Opelika, AL. The location was a referral from a friend who always has a positive experience there. Our experience was the same. The medical staff were all very customer-service oriented, kind and attentive. Our wait was very short, diagnosis made quickly, prescription called into our pharmacy, and we were back home in no time. I recommend this Urgent Care facility to others.

name: Slay With Trace
text: WORST doctors experience ever. The staff was very rude had no respect for me and my reasoning for coming to the doctor at all. The MA wasn’t too rude but the Doctor was EXTREMELY RUDE & a racist. There’s absolutely no way you’re supposed to go to the Doctor and the doctor just stands by the door when you’re supposed to be getting seen and checked on. I felt very disrespected in this place I’ll never be back it was an absolute waste of my money and my time. I do not recommend you to go the if you are of color because you will not get the help you need or the up most respect.

name: Greg O'Hara
text: Very polite and friendly people. The service was quick and professional.  I was taken care of with care and in a relaxed environment.  Thanks so  much and God bless you all.

name: Mary Traylor
text: Knowledge and friendly staff.  My son in law has also used this group and he recommended I go to them when i had my problem. I was pleased.

name: tina frazier
text: Very knowledgeable and friendly staff. I was given a plan of treatment and I felt much better after a couple of days. A++++

name: Willkell Boler
text: Got a test done on Friday June 19th, have yet to receive call back after being told would be 3-5 business days for results. They wont answer phone either. Been calling multiple times on different days. Waste of time.

name: Buck McGhar
text: They were very pleasant and nice to deal with. The young lady at check was very patient and unddssnding. I had a pinched nerve and could barely move.  The Dr. was vet nice and had a good bedside manor. Overall it was a wonderful experience under the circumstances.

name: Delorise Potts
text: I  loved my experience there today. Everyone there was super nice. I did not have a wait time.They were very professional. I would recommend them to everyone. Thanks so much for a wonderful experience.

name: Kathryn C
text: Passing through town when my young daughter needed care for two different medical issues.  We stopped here after reading reviews and I am so happy we did.  Front desk staff was friendly and accommodating.  Nursing assistant was professional and kind.  The P.A. we saw was outstanding with my daughter and quickly addressed both issues in a thorough and appropriate manner.  I can’t recommend this place enough.

name: David Thomasson
text: Got in and out pretty quick. Got a much needed steroid shot to open me up. I have used them before. Good folks!

name: Patrick Thrower
text: Thanks to all the staff at Stopwatch! From the receptionist to Abby the nurse practitioner, everyone was so nice! Abby gave me just the meds to get me better quick for my upcoming trip in two days. I went in on New Year’s Day and got quick and excellent service. Thanks!

name: Tamera Garner
text: The care I received was very good. The process of checking in and wait time was also very reasonable. The tech who took my vitals could have been more friendly. Sometime I could not understand what he was saying because he mumbled. He almost was awkward at what he was doing like it was his first day, but I’d had him in the past. Other than that, it was a good experience. And I am feeling better. Thank you!

name: Janet Jones
text: The nurses were kind concerned and knowledgeable. The doctor was not focused and seemed unsure. Although he was nice he wasn't attentive. He called my meds in at 11 am to the local pharmacy and I wasn't able to get them because the pharmacy couldn't release it due to the doctor not including the instructions to the them. I went to pick it up twice but to no avail. While I'm waiting there were 3 others there waiting also. One man had been in waiting two hrs. I will never go back to this particular urgent care in Opelika, Al.

name: Judith Miller
text: Finally went to Urgent care. Six hours and I feel better already. Now wish I had gone sooner. I was treated professionally and quickly. Hope I don’t need their services but won’t hesitate if I do. Judith M.

name: Ross Goodman
text:
The nurse practitioner came in to see me after I described pain in different locations running together she looked at me and said "what am I supposed to do about it?" And then says "well you know I can't prescribe you pain medication" when that thought was not even close to my biggest worry, she told me nothing was wrong and gave me no instructions on what to do if anything else happened, if the problem consists, what may be causing my problem, who to see about any of the potential problems based off my symptoms, just wasted money to visit.

It's been about 2 weeks now and my problem has gotten worse, my leg pain is almost crippling and noticeably behind my knee, and up to the other side of back, and the bottom of my foot around the arch, stiff neck... The two little tests she did involved looking up and down/left and right and palpating my spine for pain... No idea why so I'm not sure what to be aware of if I'm ever unable to pass these tests as well... Hopefully I can schedule an appointment with my GP soon and have it looked at with Someone who isn't lazy and judgemental

Update: The service here has dramatically improved and I am met with dignity and respect

name: Frank Ware
text: Was seen quickly and given sound treatment and good advice. It was getting late, but the staff was personable and helpful. They made me laugh, which of course made me feel better.

name: Mr.cheese
text: Was in and out fast, Great service and place was very clean and professional. Would recommend anyone. Thanks again.

name: Pamela Cowan
text: My experience there was amazing from the front desk to the doctor. I recommend everyone to go there to get check out. The staff was great and friendly. I got in and out in no time.

name: Sharon Ward
text: I had a cyst removed by Dr. Adams last week.  It was the best experience I have ever had. He was most caring and explained each step. The best part it was less than 20". I highly recommend Stopwatch Urgent Care😊

name: Russell McLachlan
text:
Super quick check in and super friendly!  Short wait out front and in the back.

Super friendly and thorough medical professionals in back. Really interested in getting you back up to speed!

name: pebblesrock90
text: Stopwatch Urgent Care was quick and efficient with my needs. I went in around 7:45pm and was out by 8:15pm. The staff was impeccable and it really saved me a trip to the ER.

name: Melissa Davis
text: Courteous staff and quick service! Everyone I interacted with was kind, polite, and was conscious of the time. I would definitely recommend and would return in the future.

name: Pam Tilson Rodgers
text:
Always fast & staff are very polite.
When you go in feeling really bad it's nice to get taken care of quickly & not have to sit and wait. I appreciate that a lot.

name: Landry
text: Fantastic service. So quick and always has the best staff around!!! They genuinely care about their patients and do their job better than any other urgent care around. Only go here!

name: Alexis Cureton
text: Went in expecting to be seen about a knee pain. I was told that TWO years ago they ran a test not covered by my insurance and I owe $300 when I normally only pay $35. I didn’t know anything about it until today. Refused to see me because of their mess up. Wouldn’t give me an excuse for work since I drove all the way out and wouldn’t be seen. This is the only place open besides a hospital. Do better.

name: LeeAnne Pinkard
text: The nurse was wonderful, efficient and full of common sense. They were fast but still competent.energy level was high.  Caring without being gooy.  Seemed very knowledgeable.

name: Tiffany Leonard
text: Today I was referred by my team members to this Urgent care. I've never been to this location and upon my arrival I asked where to sign in. The younger lady asked if I've ever been there before. I stated no, she handed me the forms to fill out,very short not friendly whatsoever. Skip go to the back,lady ask me height/weight,  I'm trying to get my cards put up, I asked if she was waiting on me, she said yes. I apologized so she could do her job obviously I was holding her up.  A lady goes by,greets with a smile, what? Call the police. Someone actually being nice.I then get escorted to a room, doctor walks in, very nice, after his visit he brings the lady back who I really want to ask if she's having a bad day, because her attitude was so bad.  Highlight fast service, downside bad attitude from everyone I came in contact with besides the dark headed lady and doctor! Thanks for your smiles

name: Tabitha Anglin
text:
I can't say enough abut what a great experience we had. We were welcomed with a caring and attentive receptionist. As soon as we walked in the door, the process to check us in started. There was no wasted time! We were called back quickly, and triaged in and placed into a room with concerned staff. The physician's assistant was caring and eager to listen to the patients symptoms, as well as the parents concerns, examine him and start treatment. We were very impressed that we could have his prescriptions filled at such a late hour, across the street at the EAMC Apothecary. From the receptionist, nurse and PA, we are overall very impressed with such a high standard of care and with a very professional staff.
As a Mother of a sick child, when you have a experience like this, you can't help but feel at ease when you can see the genuine care within all the staff. You know you have brought your child to the right place. Thank you, Thank you!
Such a blessing to have such a wonderful experience!!

name: Jaret Bottoms
text: Extremely fast and the nurse was nice and the doctor had a great bedside manner and makes you feel better when you don’t. I came in and was very quickly told I had the flu and was prescribed some medicine and was out the door fast. Very quick and a nice waiting room and facility.

name: Nakia Dorsey
text: I was welcomed the first moment I walked in the door. It was a friendly and calm atmosphere. The doctors was well knowledge and knew how to solve my problem. I rate Stopwatch at perfect 5. Thanks.

name: Shannon Bourg
text: Quick, clean, knowledgeable and friendly staff. I was in and out in under an hour, and when u feel awful that matters. Thanks stopwatch!

name: Steven Rush
text: I hate giving bad reviews, but compared to the other Urgent Care facilities available in the Auburn Opelika area, Stopwatch urgent care across from the hospital is the one to AVOID AT ALL COSTS. After an insurance glitch it was clear to me that this corporation is only set up to separate you from your money. Medical care and patient comfort are a very low priority for this facility.
