According to the statements given to me by the front desk, they have a different physician assistant or nurse practitioner every. single. day! Also, records of our previous visits are incorrect or missing!  It's horrifying and disappointing to me that businesses like this are allowed to exist. If a basic blood test (basic = worthless) and random scrip are what you need, you may get lucky here. My sincere advice is DO NOT RISK IT!  Your health should be the top priority... at Stopwatch it simply is not. Very disappointing.

name: Charles' AC
text:
Got in quickly.
Great staff front and back.
Adams AMAZING
Great bedside, great care-
Literally TOP TO BOTTOM MEDICAL CARE

THE BEST!!!

name: Caitie Love
text:
Superb service. I was in and out in less than 15 minutes honestly. They were very helpful and answered any questions I had.

Update: it has been an entire week, and I am still sick. I have taken all the pills they gave me. I am more than disappointed in this business, and I will not be returning. Make sure you’re comfortable going to the doctor twice if you go here.

name: Brandon Sanders
text: The staff were so nice to my daughter and we were in and out in less than 20 minutes.  Cannot say enough good stuff about the staff we dealt with.  Thank you folks so much.

name: Heather Higgs
text:
If I could leave a 0 I would, waiting well over 2 hours for a 10 second mandatory test? I’m here still waiting.
“We’re super busy”
Girl I’ve been in this office over two hours and seen TWO people walk in. It’s sad really, get it together. If I could leave and go back to work without the test I would.

name: Georgia Beaty
text: Quickly was seen. Professionally treated. Thoroughly checked. Friendly staff

name: Robbie Thomas
text: I enjoyed my visit. I was in and out in a timely manner. They were thorough, patient and  friendly from the time I entered until my departure. Thanks to all who assisted you all were AWESOME!!!

name: Ashley Ray
text: Dont bother with this place. They do NOT answer the phones, and they do NOT call you back. Call them right now and see😂

name: K O (JWsGirl)
text:
I was sent here by my insurance due to not having a primary doctor yet and I was very pleased. Everyone there was so kind and courteous. They had me in and out within 20 minutes! This will be my go to for minor emergency issues. Too bad I couldn't use the doctor that I seen as my primary 😔 sure would make life so much easier.
Thank you Stopwatch Urgent Care.

name: Tippy Toe
text: Rude physicians will never be back.

name: Allyson Shore
text: The nurses were really friendly and courteous. They helped me with whatever I needed and were genuinely concerned about my condition. The doctor on the other hand was very rude and short with me. He even rolled his eyes at one point when I asked him a question. I found this incredibly unprofessional behavior from a doctor.

name: Mike Morehouse
text: Had a very good experience at Stopwatch Urgent Care Opelika. Very efficient and friendly staff. I was seen quickly and the medical staff was caring and communicative. Took care of me in fine fashion .I am very pleased with the service and care I received there

name: Jerry Jackson
text: Everyone (front counter, dr, Med assistant all treated me like I was only one there. They came to the waiting room to assist me and make me comfortable until I could be seen, which was only 3 minutes. We did paperwork after being seen, which the urgency of my condition required.

name: Lindsey Woodall
text: I was seen very quickly. I love that this location is open until 11PM. Everyone was very nice and helpful! Would recommend!

name: Rachel Johnson
text: In and out supper quick, certainly cheaper than a go at the ER. When you're sick you don't feel like sitting around waiting to be seen, that was not the case here. Super happy with my experience and the staff was very friendly and helpful.

name: Mary Wynne Kling
text:
On Saturday night my daughter was bouncing on the bed, fell and needed stitches near he eyebrow.
Wanting to avoid taking a five year old to the emergency room, we went to Twilight Urgent Care. Dr. Cunningham and the staff did an EXCELLENT job caring for my daughter. They were quick and efficient, we spent so little time in the waiting room we couldn't even get the admission paperwork finished before they called us back. They were very patient and understanding with my daughter, but also worked to get her taken care of as quickly as possible.
I couldn't be happier with the care we received, and are so happy to know we have someone great to go see when Moore's Mill (our daytime urgent care of choice) isn't open.

name: Mary Jewell
text: Awesome experience!! Everyone one was super nice and concerned!! Very clean facility. Also didn’t have to wait long to be called back or see doctor.

name: Carrie Berkstresser
text: They were really quick and kind to me. The only problem I had was that they called my medicine in to a different pharmacy because mine was closed, but they didn't tell me. They were really helpful at getting everything straightened out the next day when I was confused away CVS.

name: Lisa Brooks
text: Stopwatch Urgent Care is a great place for urgent medical needs.  The staff are knowledgeable and friendly.  The physicians are thorough and respond appropriately to your concerns.

name: weenona schassler
text:
I don't feel that the PA took the time to truly assess my complaints. "It could be a staph infection, it could be cellulites. You might have strep, you might have pharentitus (not sure if spelling). I'll give you an antibiotic that will treat it regardless." I didn't come in for a two minute consult. No strep test was done. He just glanced at my leg. I have a knot the size of a lemon on my leg that is inflamed and hot to the touch. It is painful and itches. I'm very uncomfortable.
Not happy at all.

name: Jon Benson
text: Dr. Washington was very dismissive of my report of past history. He declared I was suffering from allergies before he had even examined me. Even after the x-rays showed signs of bronchitis he prescribed me allergy medication. I feel highly offended and wish to lodge a complaint. I am currently struggling to breathe properly and he showed no sympathy and would not help. Additionally he had multiple pieces of incorrect information in my report which he said he would change.

name: Larissa Kay
text: We were visiting from out of town and my almost 3 year old ended up with a UTI over the weekend. This clinic was very easy to work with and professional. We were in and out within an hour.

name: Paula King
text: Everyone was quick and caring today! Dr. H was excellent! Listened and answered my questions about my being sickly so close to my trip overseas. Gave me several options of things she does when traveling. Thanks again StopWatch Urgent Care!

name: Angela Mcminn
text: Service was good til they made me go to ER for a catscan and still charger my card and didn't even do anything to me ... I will be reporting to the BBB on this and 4 weeks later my card still has not been refunded...

name: Deidra Mcgill
text:
Great experience for my first visit
Everyone was very nice.  Got in and out and picked up my RX next door within a short time.

name: Kacie Tyson
text: Just went here today to get tested for the flu. I went about 9:30 and there was zero wait time. They got me in and out in less than 30 min. Staff and doctor were great! Understanding and took care of my needs. Will definitely see them for future illnesses!

name: Jerry Mays
text: Initially, I was favorably impressed with the facility and staff. I was there because of an acute pain in my back, which has begun early in the week. My visit was on Saturday morning. After a discussion with the doctor and an examination, he determined that I may have a kidney stone. He said he would request a CT scan at Bridgeway Diagnostic and that they would call me “tomorrow”. I did not get a call Sunday and, checking their website, I learned that Bridgeway is closed on the weekend. Today, Monday, I called Bridgeway and learned that Stopwatch Urgent Care never sent the CT scan request.

name: Kenya Mann
text: This was my first time visiting Stopwatch. It was actually a pleasant experience.  The staff is very professional, prompt and friendly.  I will definitely return for future visits.

name: Skip Courtney
text: New patient process was wuick and easy. 5 minute wait. Dr was very knowledgeable and also very personable. Provided immediate relief

name: Jaimie Spencer
text:
Always fast prompt service. They don’t leave you in the patients room for long before coming in!
Friendly staff. Always my first choice to go when I’m feeling ill

name: Lisa Beasley
text: Everyone was so friendly. That helps when you’re not feeling well. They took very good care of me.

name: Nicole_222
text: Very good service! I was only there about 30 minutes and I feel better already! This is the best place to go for fast but wonderful care!

name: Morgan Riley
text:
The take my insurance(BCBSAL) just not my specific plan without getting a referral... for Urgent care... at 10:30pm. $140 to see if this pain is a serious problem or something to heal own it's own.
Everything so rushed I didn't even have time to think of all of the details to tell the Dr. He looks and touches a little but doesn't see clear evidence of anything... give it another week and if it's still hurting call us back.
🧡PAIN🧡

name: Larissa Kay
text: We were visiting from out of town and my almost 3 year old ended up with a UTI over the weekend. This clinic was very easy to work with and professional. We were in and out within an hour.

name: Diane Corbin
text: Excellent service.   Will recommend to all my friends.  The Dr was very thorough and kind.

name: weenona schassler
text:
I don't feel that the PA took the time to truly assess my complaints. "It could be a staph infection, it could be cellulites. You might have strep, you might have pharentitus (not sure if spelling). I'll give you an antibiotic that will treat it regardless." I didn't come in for a two minute consult. No strep test was done. He just glanced at my leg. I have a knot the size of a lemon on my leg that is inflamed and hot to the touch. It is painful and itches. I'm very uncomfortable.

🧡PAIN🧡

name: Kimberly Key (A Southern Mama)
text: Every visit I have encountered has been great. 90% of the time I'm so nervous and forget what all I wanted to ask so I'll even ask sometimes for the doc to come back in. They are always prompt and caring. I've never had issues with any staff members. Each member does their job accordingly. This isn't an ER or hospital setting .. Therefore they are limited. Some people sadly fail to realize that. I have called several times to have meds changed or even added.. Or maybe even a recheck. They are always prompt and kind. I do not have a primary care physician. I use them when needed and hope to continue. Don't judge every place based off someone else's experience. Go and see for yourself.

name: Teresa peppers
text: The staff was pleasant and friendly. I appreciate the after business hours, that's the reason I chose coming to your location. My wait time was a couple of hours too long. If I had known, I was going to be seen by a Nurse Practitioner and not a doctor, I probably wouldn't have waited that long and gone somewhere else the next day. I requested cough syrup to ease my cough and that would help me sleep; I received a prescription for cough medicine with anti-nausea medicine in it. Nausea isn't one of my problems. I just wanted to stop coughing and finally get some sleep. What happened the cough medicine with pain medicine?

name: Norma Cusanek
text: I arrived back in the US with what I thought was a nasty cold but knew something wasn't right...so I looked up StopWatch (I've used them before) but the one in my area was closed.  I scrolled down to discover that the one in Opelika was open.  So I drove there straight away.  They got me in and diagnosed with 20 minutes of my arrival.  Staff are courteous, compassionate and professional.  I'd choose them again if I need urgent care    Thank you Opelika Stop Watch Urgent Care!

name: Annette Screws
text: I was very pleased with the care that was shown to me while I was there the staff was awesome!

name: Elizabeth Millette
text: I would recommend this Urgent Care to anyone in the Auburn/Opelika area. I particularly like the Opelika location. It is open late (11 pm). I went on a Saturday at 6:30. There were about 4 people ahead of me and I was seen in less than an hour. What I like most about the Opelika location is the Dr. (I really wish I remembered his name)! He is great! Very friendly, takes time to explain everything and answer questions. I would definitely choose them again if I need urgent care.

name: Jerry Mays
text: Initially, I was favorably impressed with the facility and staff. I was there because of an acute pain in my back, which has begun early in the week. My visit was on Saturday morning. After a discussion with the doctor and an examination, he determined that I may have a kidney stone. He said he would request a CT scan at Bridgeway Diagnostic and that they would call me “tomorrow”. I did not get a call Sunday and, checking their website, I learned that Bridgeway is closed on the weekend. Today, Monday, I called Bridgeway and learned that Stopwatch Urgent Care never sent the CT scan request.

name: Shari Bartlow
text: Very friendly, efficient, fast!  No complaints and would definitely use them again!

name: David Corry
text: The staff and facilities are superb. Every one was very professional and kind.  I would recommend this medical facility to anyone.

name: Virginia Crawford
text: Staff is great. Docs and PA always thorough.

name: Teresa peppers
text: The staff was pleasant and friendly. I appreciate the after business hours, that's the reason I chose coming to your location. My wait time was a couple of hours too long. name: Leah Kelly
text: Great customer service. Staff was friendly and professional. Facility was very clean. There were several people in the waiting room when I got there but I was in and out in 30 mins!!

name: Meghan Cochrane
text: The staff was professional and courteous. I was seen quickly. The facility was able to preform the test needed to diagnose my problem. I was ask to come back the following day for a follow-up.  I would recommend Stopwatch Urgent Care as an alternative to the emergency room.

name: Melinda Hands
text: Reception great ..... Staff great......very pleased with my experience! Especially since I'm not local! No hoops to jump thru to be seen

name: Christi Gibson
text: Honestly, I utilize Stopwatch urgent for their services more than my primary doctor due to their hours of operation & knowledgeable office & medical staff.  They are generally prompt & i am blessed they are nearby.

name: Tracy King
text: This is the best urgent care! They are efficent and fit right in to your day because you are in and out so fast!

name: Kimberly Key (A Southern Mama)
text: Every visit I have encountered has been great. 90% of the time I'm so nervous and forget what all I wanted to ask so I'll even ask sometimes for the doc to come back in. They are always prompt and caring. I've never had issues with any staff members. Each member does their job accordingly. This isn't an ER or hospital setting .. Therefore they are limited. Some people sadly fail to realize that. I have called several times to have meds changed or even added.. Or maybe even a recheck. They are always prompt and kind. I do not have a primary care physician. I use them when needed and hope to continue. Don't judge every place based off someone else's experience. Go and see for yourself.

name: Melissa Chisum
text: Got in and out quick, the dr we saw was very nice and helpful, but the price of the office visit was ridiculous.

name: Lydia Blanton
text: All staff was super super nice and very efficient. I was in and out with a diagnosis and good direction in 40 minutes.

name: Alnita Edwards
text: The attendant didn't check his vitals.  A stethoscope was not used.   Blood pressure was not checked.  Strep test, pulse and  temperature were taken. Lympnodes were felt eyes and ears were checked.  That was it. This morning he says his chest hurts when he breathes.  Getting his prescription transferred was not a problem since CVS didn't have it.

name: Brittany S. Deyerle
text: Staff is professional and very friendly. I was in and out in less than 40 minutes total! I appreciated the quick diagnosis and treatment, especially when you're not feeling well!

name: Michael Tolbert
text: It was fast i still do not understand my copay being as much as it was but over all everything seem to be fine

name: Kristen King
text: Everyone is amazing! From the front desk to the clinic staff! Thanks for all you do! 😊

name: Latonya Hicks
text: I went to Stopwatch this morning with two different issues, I was told that since it was an urgent care that I can only been seen for one issue. I was stunned about this because I have been to  urgent care facilities and have been seen and treated for multiple issues. I was also told to take my pick of which issue was worst and if I chose to do both issues that my insurance was only going to pay for the cheapest one and I was going to receive a bill for the other. This is not right because the two issues was at the same pain rate that I was experiencing. I haven't ever been told to choose one out of multiple issues to be seen for. I couldn't get an appointment with my regular doctor so that was the reason for the visit. Never again I would ever let someone tell me what I can't do especially when I'm in pain. Sad how people who work in healthcare facilities don't care about someone's health.They are just there to get a check and I have a degree in Health care and can't even get a job in that field. I see why because they hire people like those at Stopwatch who don't care. Yet, I'm still in pain with my other issue and probably have to visit another urgent care for that problem.Unnecessary money being spent for no reason at all.

name: John Waldrip
text: This Urgent care is the best. I like going to Urgent Care because when I am sick, I can’t get an appointment for a couple of weeks. I can’t wait a couple of weeks. I either be well or dead by then.

name: David Chapman
text: There were 15 people ahead of me when I arrived. My total time spent was 2 hours. No too bad.

name: Bubba Harrison
text:
My first visit at Stopwatch was in January of this year. There was no wait time and was seen immediately! The nurse practitioner, I’m sorry I can’t remember her name but she was very smart and beautiful, diagnosed my problem, she administered the meds I needed and I had a complete recovery!

This second visit was just as remarkable! Again, no wait time and was seen immediately! This time I was given a card with the receptionist name, Halie, medical assistant, Luisa, x-ray tech, Lisa and doctor, Adams! They were all awesome! Once I told the doctor what was going on, again, he immediately diagnosed my problem, administered the meds I needed and I had a complete recovery!

I can’t  comment on the negative reviews of this office cause I wasn’t there but my two experiences were totally awesome and will continue to visit them every time I have a health problem! Much easier to be seen immediately here than my person physician! Please give them a try!

name: Phyllis Wilder
text: Great service! Friendly, courteous, prompt service. Excellent physician! Highly recommend.

name: Tracy King
text: This is the best urgent care! They are efficent and fit right in to your day because you are in and out so fast!

text: Horrible bedside manner. Staff rushed you out. Didn't apply splint correctly, had to go back the next day. Didn't have crutches for a broken foot, told us to get them "at a thrift shop". Nurses didn't know what or why they were doing what they were doing. No paper work. No explanation of anything, not even medications they were injecting into you. Just showed you to the nearest exit. Semi fast service but horrible quality.

name: C Fisher
text: Very Knowledgeable Dr. He Explained Everything To Me..Didn't  Leave Puzzled..I Was Confident In His Decisions...No Long Wait...I Would Definitely Recommend Stop Watch To Anyone...Love My Experiences Here..

text: I love this place! Everyone is so nice and caring and you avoid the long wait at your Dr’s office!

name: Dr. Nettie Echols
text: Thank you for your professional services and prompt attention for my health care needs.

name: Jessica Battle
text: I was in and out quickly! The staff and doctor were very professional.

name: Vivian DuPriest
text: So Thankful for Stopwatch Urgent Care! After sitting in the ER for 3 hours and not being seen for Kidney Stones. At Stopwatch Urgent Care they took care of me in no time at all!! Truly appreciated!

text: I went in for stitches & they were very nice, professional, caring, and FAST. I barely had to wait at all 10/10 would recommend :)

name: Charles J King
text: The staff and the doctor at this establishment was very courteous and professional. And the physician that I saw today ordered me the right medicine to stop the pain that I was having

name: Kelly Sprayberry
text: Sweetest staff & very tentative to patients needs.

name: tamica woods
text: Very pleasant atmosphere. Thankful for the friendliness and promptness of the staff😊

name: Carol Nolan
text: Walked in and was taken immediately.  Staff was friendly,  attentive and professional.  I will definitely use this service again.

name: Candy Lanier
text: I was seen quickly and the staff was very friendly.

name: Me Me
text: This clinic is AWESOME. They are really the best clinic in this area!

name: Holli Thomas
text: I've been going here since they opened... Today's visit was horrible! The waiting room floor is filthy the bathroom is filthy there's no toilet paper in the bathroom... And nobody actually wants to draw your blood and check your blood for nothing no more, oh well your covid is negative! What about what's wrong with me? Double ear infection but yet you said I can go back to work tomorrow when I can't even halfway function. And I'm not even going to go into what happened 5 days previous to this at the same place!

name: lkbraswell
text: Quickly taken back and concerns addressed.  Very helpful, polite and kind care!

name: Elizabeth Pratt
text: Super fast and Dr was very attentive.  He made sure to address all of my concerns and didn't rush me out to get to the next patient

name: Caroline May
text: K.Nessler, the PA that treated me was wonderful. She was very direct and kind and made me feel cared for.

name: S E
text: Went at a good time, no waiting.  Receptionist, nurse and doctor were all top notch.

name: linda forbus
text: Fastest urgent care service I've ever had! Friendly, and had an actual doctor on staff.

name: Antonio Tarver
text: I prefer stopwatch over any emergency room or doctor office.

name: Shirley Garner
text: Great! We were sitting in the ER, which had a 3 hour wait and I posted on Facebook that I was in the ER. 2 people said 'Why are you there. Go to Stopwatch across the street.' We went across the street to Stopwatch and I have to tell you it was FAB! I got stitched up and was there less than an hour. We will forever be thankful for this place.

name: Jeff Kyser
text: Really loved the effort and diagnosis. Was able to get I quick and the staff is very efficient and admirable!

name: Brad Caldwell
text: These guys are usually very friendly

name: Ashlee Perryman
text: Dr. Adam's was great!!!! He went above and beyond. I was in and out in about 30 minutes.

name: Stanley Garrett
text: Friendly place, I was in out with in 39 minutes. At the end of the day I was feeling good.

name: Inez Hammon
text: Very clean facility. Quick and friendly staff. Nice size waiting area with a good atomosphere.

name: nadia Brundage
text: Great people, great service. In and out. I highly recommend.

name: Kent Jones
text: Very quick experience, office staff and doctor were very friendly.

name: pam adcock

name: samantha sperduto
text: The worst experience I have ever had. In March, I fell down the stairs and badly injured my ankle. It was to the point that I actually had to cut my sandal off because of the swelling. Since it was after hours, and I did not want to wait hours in the emergency room, I decided to go to the Urgent Care Twilight on Opelika Rd. Upon checking into the location, the receptionist and staff were very short to answer any questions I was having. On top of that, their bedside manner was terrible. I could not even walk on my own because of the swelling and pain, to the point where I was leaning on a friend. Seeing us struggling, they did not have the decency to offer to help my friend who was trying to support me. They actually made me stand at the counter and fill out paperwork, instead of letting me sit down to finish filling everything out in the EMPTY waiting room. The staff did not offer any wheelchairs/crutches/anything to steady myself, forcing me to walk from the check in, to triage, then to a room.  Once I was FINALLY sitting on an exam table, they had taken X-rays and arrived back shortly saying it was "just a sprain" and it "should be fine in two weeks." Then they wrapped my ankle in an ACE bandage, charged me $150 (w insurance), and STILL did not offer any assistance in my mobility. On top of all of that? Months later, it is still swollen and I am still having difficulty with my ankle. I went to go see another doctor, and turns out, my ankle was fractured, not sprained. Definitely do NOT recommend wasting your time or money just to have your well being jepordized by an unfriendly staff that seemed to be there just to make a paycheck.

name: zmthornton
text:
This office told my wife that they were a Blue Cross Blue Shield provider, but then called her back to see an RN that wasn't fully certified by BCBS. Because of their error, I was billed $200 extra. After long waits on the phone with BCBS, I found out the story above.

At 9:30 am today I called Stopwatch to ask about how we could have been charged if we confirmed at the front desk that we were covered. They told me they would contact billing and return my call. When I didn't hear back from them in 30 min, I stopped by the office to ask in person about the error. After waiting for 20 minutes in the waiting room, I ended up calling the billing office myself and actually having to pass my phone to the receptionist to get their error fixed. After all that, they admitted fault and adjusted my bill.

My kid was sick when I went in to talk about billing, so I thought I might as well have him seen now that the billing issue was worked out.

We waited a reasonable 20 min, they did a flu test, and released us with an RX called in to CVS.

I had to call twice, but they finally said they were resenting my RX. I assumed it'd be ready in an hour.

Wrong again. After trusting them to call in my prescription twice now, I went to Walgreens around 12:30, only to have them tell me that it hadn't been called in. So I had to call the office a FOURTH time now, and get them to actually call my prescription in.

Stopwatch forgot to cancel the RX at CVS, so I had to call CVS for them and ask them to cancel that prescription so that my finally called in RX could be filled at Walgreens. I got my kid's medicine at 1:30, after sitting in Walgreens for an hour for a prescription that was supposed to be called in and picked up. My sick kid fell asleep sitting up because of how long we had to wait.

Dragging my sick kid all over town and having to wait multiple hours because of Stopwatch's errors makes me positive that I'll never use this Urgent Care again. They have serious communication issues.
